title: To amend part C of title XVIII to require Medicare+Choice organizations to offer Medicare+Choice plans for a minimum period of three years, and to permit Medicare beneficiaries to enroll and disenroll from such plans at any time.
content: Medicare Choice Accountability Act of 2001 - Amends the Social Security Act to: (1) extend the Medicare Choice contract period to three years, and (2) permit continuous open enrollment or disenrollment.
